text_logic_form: The triangle $ABC$ is similar to the triangle $CBD$.
The length of the line $CD$ is $4$ units.
The length of the line $DB$ is $3$ units.
The length of the line $CB$ is $5$ units.
Find the perimeter of the triangle $ACB$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The triangle $ABC$ is similar to the triangle $CBD$.
The length of the line $CD$ is $4$ units.
The length of the line $DB$ is $3$ units.
The length of the line $CB$ is $5$ units.
Find the perimeter of the triangle $ACB$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CB$ is $5$ units.
The length of the line $CD$ is $4$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $3$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $B$.
The line $AC$ is perpendicular to the line $CB$.
The line $CD$ is perpendicular to the line $AD$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, $BD$, $CB$, and $CD$ forming two triangles $ABC$ and $CBD$.
